author: Ken W
title: Exceeded expectations
text:
We stayed here for a night before flying out of London City and I must admit that I was prepared to be underwhelmed. How wrong I was!
The hotel is a very easy 150 yard walk from Royal Albert DLR, and even though it was dark it was simple to find.
Very efficient check in and we were pleased by the cleanliness and quality of the bedroom. Lovely big comfy bed and excellent bathroom.
We did go out of the hotel for dinner, but had a drink at the bar when we got back. Excellent friendly table service by Paula who is an absolute diamond.
A good night's sleep enabled us to get up early and grab some breakfast before setting off to the airport. We decided to just have a bacon roll each and a croissant plus a few cups of coffee, but other choices were there on the buffet.
We could have got a DLR to the airport but that would've taken about 20 mins so we hopped in a cab for a 5 minute ride instead. About as easy and convenient as you could wish for.
Good and simple wifi too. All in all an excellent hotel for the price and location.
Would definitely stay again.
